explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of machine learning for stock price prediction and compares the proposed model with benchmark models using machine learning approaches.
explanations.neural network: The paper proposes a new hybrid neural network model (CEEMDAN-SC-LSTM) for stock price forecasting.
explanations.deep learning: The proposed model includes deep learning components such as convolutional layers and LSTM layers.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The model employs three convolutional layers to capture complex patterns in the data.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for convolutional neural network, which is used in the proposed model.
explanations.long short-term memory: The model includes an LSTM layer to capture temporal patterns in the data.
explanations.LSTM: Abbreviation for long short-term memory, which is a key component of the proposed model.
explanations.feature learning: The paper discusses data preprocessing and enhancement techniques (CEEMDAN and SG filter) which are related to feature learning.
explanations.representation learning: The hybrid neural network model learns representations of the data to improve forecasting accuracy.
